short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes correct answers from canvas quizzes by edting the HTML

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension uses jQuery to modify the HTML tags on the active tab to hide the solutions of a marked Canvas quiz. Refresh the page to re-enable the answers.
